document.full_text: dirk nowitzki's 3-pointer from the top of the key with 1 minute 14 seconds remaining was the decisive shot as dallas eliminated oklahoma city in five games.
document.title: mavericks 100, thunder 96: nowitzki gives mavericks another shot at a title
lines_and_colors: dirk nowitzki's 3-pointer from the top of the key with 1 minute 14 seconds remaining was the decisive shot as dallas eliminated oklahoma city in five games.
